> [[ HP: 11 / 35 ]]

“...we've got more cover than we did up above with access to the adjacent branches, and there's a dead-zone on that spinning attack.” You add, moving closer to the girls as the splashing footsteps from the branch you just left growing louder. “It can't hit anyone that's either too close or too far—meaning once we engage, we can finish him off. The only problem is organizing something like this. We're all separated, so...”

“I thought you'd be the first one on board for a ridiculous plan.” Aelriss smiles, briefly glancing upward.

“...Right.” It is your fault you're down here, regardless of how much damage you might have done to the boss. Which, incidentally, you believe was tremendous. “You got me. What are you thinking?”

“Nel's got the map.” Aelriss says. “He's with them. I'm messaging them now, and he's gonna get everyone in position.”

“Think he can do it?” You ask.

“Hell yeah.” She responds. “Which leaves us with just one more problem...”

> Stick together and try to kite the golem down a single branch as a group.
> Split up so you don't get cut down, and let anyone it's not going after get into position.
> Suggest launching an attack as the golem rounds the upcoming corner.
> Other.
